title: LoL on xbox one?
body:
Hi everyone, I have an interesting question for you and specially for Riot.
With the new release of Microsoft enabling mouse and keyboard to Xbox One, do you think that Riot games can add our lovely league to the console?
I would love to see it happening because I do not have great PC to run league with all features.

Please let me know what you think about it!

See yah.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

ever heard of a joke, lmao... god i wish people would stop being such soft%%%%%, literally nobody who PC master races actually doesn't give a shit about consoles, remember what came first, we had consoles for games before PC's were even capable of it....

I wonder if that would go against from what Riot Games would want.

 If I remember correctly you need Xbox Live Gold in order to play with other people online which is a paid subscription, and League of Legends is a multiplayer game so it'll require a Xbox live unless Riot Games would make their own way through it. 

The PC version of League of Legends doesn't require any subscription that needs to be paid in order to go online.

 I don't think it would fit in the category of being free to play for everyone then. Which is one of the key things of the game that might attract people and might be what Riot Games wants to keep the game as. Kind of like Smite and Paladins. It kinda sucks that you have to pay online to play multiplayer, but then those game's servers are seperate to the pc ones. (I think)

But on the other hand if the game didnt require a Live Gold subscription, I guess people who use the xbox might start complaining that because League of Legends doesn't need a Live subscription, why should SMITE, Paladins etc need it.

Yeah, about this free to play methodology you are right. But as I pay live gold every year, it wouldn't be an issue for me.
In this case you would have the choice of playing or not, live gold is a subscription that is more than just enabling you to play online games, this thing goes beyond. 
Phil Spencer wants everything to be a cross-platform btw, I do not see a issue between both companies, after all it is a win win.

That's a possibility as well, it will all depend on the demand from the people that would like it and out of those people who would want to pay to play League as well as capabilities of League with the current tech Riot has.

It would be a huge step for Riot Games though, could earn a lot of money and players but with that comes another whole platform to support. They'd probably have to set another whole team or something to deal with the XBOX platform and its players. It'd be pretty interesting to see though!

The people who don't have as capable computers but have an Xbox would benefit the most from it I'm guessing.

Why not PUBG did it, free on PC and cost on XBOX. Could and should, even if its a little version for console only etc. as a wise 90's rapper once said, cash rules everything around me cream get the money, dollar dollar bills y'all! I think it was method man.
